name: Rivtek - industrial ALU-U.
//: An ALU, (assisted-lifting utility-unit,) is a pair of mobile powered-gauntlet, externally-powered hydraulics power and interface directly to the operators’ hydraulic muscles. These PCE’s were usually deployed as aids in industrial construction work; but here in the cataclysm, it lets you punch with the force of a hulk. [These PCE’s are to be used in conjunction with power-gauntlet weaponry, for maximum effect.] [Hydraulic Muscles required for maximum efficiency.]
